Global.PanesTemplate:
<TabItem x:Name="_wizTab01" Header="@TabTitle" Style="{DynamicResource TabItemsWhite}" Width="150" Margin="0,0,0,0" IsEnabled="False">
@TabItemContent
</TabItem>

Pane.title: Deployment Readiness
Pane.SubTitle: "Let's check the readiness of this device"
Pane.Help:
"Next, a simple series of checks will validate the deployment readiness of this deivce.

If the validation succeeds, you can continue wth the deployment"

Pane.title: Task Sequence
Pane.SubTitle: "Search the name of a Task Sequence..."
Pane.Help:
"Select a Task sequence to execute on this device.

Use the filter buttons to drill to a specific task sequence. 

WARNING: The Task Sequence may format the disk drive and all data will be lost"

Pane.title: Device Details
Pane.Condition: Property("DeploymentType")<>"REPLACE" and Property("DeploymentType")<>"CUSTOM" and Property("DeploymentType") <> "StateRestore" and Property("DeploymentType")<> "UPGRADE"
Pane.SubTitle: "Let's get the basic things out of the way"
Pane.Help:
"Fill in all available fields.

The device name must meet certain criteria's

Select whether you want the device to join a domain or a workgroup"

Pane.title: Administrator Credentials
Pane.SubTitle: "Is this information correct?"
Pane.Help:
"Specify the the local administrator password.

This will used for logging into the computer to complete the deployment. 

Type the names of accounts to be added to the local administrators. Use semicolons to separate account names. 

If Account does not exist, they will be created as Administrators"

Pane.title: Locale and Time
Pane.Condition: Property("DeploymentType")<>"REPLACE" and Property("DeploymentType")<>"CUSTOM" and Property("DeploymentType") <> "StateRestore" and Property("DeploymentType")<> "UPGRADE"
Pane.SubTitle: "Is this the time zone your in?"
Pane.Help: "Select a locale time zone and language."

Pane.title: Applications
Pane.SubTitle: "Select additional applications to install"
Pane.Help:
"Select one or more applications to install during the deployment process. 

Use the filter buttons to drill to a specific applciations group. 

Application Bundles are a set of pre-selected applications"

Pane.title: Summary
Pane.Help:
"This is a summary of all selections within the deployment wizard.

These setting will be used during the deployment process. 

Click Begin when ready"
